item.description:
Due to the holiday the meetup is MOVED this month to the 11th of July.

We have been unable to secure a speaker, so will instead be having a mingling/networking session. Please RSVP so we know that we have enough interest, if not we will just cancel for this month and meet in August.

Note that we are starting at 6.15, half an hour later than usual, due to no speaker.

Thanks!
David
item.name: Greater New Haven Design and Marketing July Meetup
